scripts.build: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ run build; npm --prefix ./app/ run build; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ run build; npm --prefix ./admin/ run build; cp ./app/node_modules/ol/ol.css ./dist/; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css ./dist/; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.min.css ./dist/; cp -r ./app/node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts ./dist/; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap/LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE-bootstrap.txt; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap-icons/LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE-bootstrap-icons.txt; cp ./app/node_modules/ol/LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE-openlayers.txt; cp ./app/node_modules/datatables/media/LICENSE.txt ./dist/LICENSE-datatables.txt
scripts.devbuild: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./app/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./admin/ run devbuild; cp ./app/node_modules/ol/ol.css ./dist/; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css ./dist/; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.min.css ./dist/; cp -r ./app/node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts ./dist/; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap/LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE-bootstrap.txt; cp ./app/node_modules/bootstrap-icons/LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE-bootstrap-icons.txt; cp ./app/node_modules/ol/LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE-openlayers.txt; cp ./app/node_modules/datatables/media/LICENSE.txt ./dist/LICENSE-datatables.txt
scripts.install: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ install; npm --prefix ./app/ install; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ install; npm --prefix ./admin/ install
